revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=NSA325 |revision=v2 |asin=B00FJ2CE4O |newegg=0B1-00TN-00004 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=10/2013 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN27LN1G08-25TIP |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G0846Q-BCK0 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, SATA II, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Real Time Clock;NXP;8563T;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Controller;NEC;D720200AF1;;1;,,, 8-bit MCU with EEPROM;Holtek;HT66F30;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4459;;1;,,, 8Mbit Serial NOR Flash;Macronix;MX25L8006EM1I-12G;;1;,,, 2A 23V Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7182S;;4;,,, 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Advanced Analog Circuits;AZ1117H;;2;,,, 340kHz 2A 23V Synchronous Step-down Converter;Richtek;RT8295A;;1;,,, 340kHz 2A/3A Synchronous Step-down DC/DC;Global Mixed-mode Tech;G5795;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery, fan |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8;KW LSP release 5.1.3 patch 18; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Debian, Arch Linux (Arm) |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui_eth=28:28:5D }} {{TagLine|2-Bay Power Plus Media Server}} :[http://origin-eu.zyxel.com/ProductTab.shtml?pid=20130508112312&idx=7&c=gb&l=en Specifications] "45-402-000443" is silkscreened on the main board ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F6282 @1.6GHz (ARM v5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 128MB NAND Flash, 2x SATA II *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 *Power: 12V 5A via barrel plug ==Images== ---- File:ZyXEL NSA325v2 Main Top.jpeg|Main Board Top File:ZyXEL NSA325v2 Main Bottom.jpeg|Main Board Bottom File:ZyXEL NSA325v2 SATA Board.jpeg|SATA Board [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
